::Spears::

She dodged and weaved trying to avoid the fire.  She had shots hit 
her in the shoulders, legs and torso, but she wasn't going to give up.
She got hit by a shell and it threw her back against the ship.  She 
hit the hull then slid to the ground.  She landed and shook her 
head.  She transformed into porcupine mode and turned her back to the 
preds.  She spun around throwing 10 quills at them.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> The Oblitercons/Nemesis 
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Zergling/Oinker/Punch/Ramhorn:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Breakdown cursed as a quill barely cut into his armored cannon 
mode, 
> soon laughing, firing off another shell at Spears.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss yelled, a spear slicing open his left side.  He fell to a 
knee, 
> firing off another rocket at a cannon that was moving to open fire 
on 
> the Oblitercons.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One activated his targeting sytems.  Gettinga lock, he fired 
off 
> two missiles at an autocannon, laughing as the meager defenses 
opened 
> fire on him, digging into his light armor.
> 
> ---
> 
> A compartment in the front of Pyro slipped open, as did another one 
> only a few feet next to it.  He fired off two missiles, one at a 
> different cannon.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger opened fire, twenty-five shells steaking out at Rodimus 
> Prime.
> 
> ======
> 
> "Emperor Nemesis Enforcer, the troops are assembled.  There are 
three 
> of them."
> 
> "Excellent, Scattershot.  Tell them to attack, full speed ahead!"
> 
> "Yes...sir...psycho." Scattershot said the last word in a whisper, 
> activating the intercom for the outside of the ship.
> "GO ATTACK THE ARK!  TAKE NO PRISONERS!  PILLAGE AND PLUNDER! KILL 
> WOMEN AND CHILDREN FIRST!" Scattershot laughed evilly, Nemesis 
> Enforcer joining in.
> 
> 
> ---
> 
> Oinker transformed into his tractor mode, Punch and Zergling 
hopping 
> on, the redneck robot going full speed for the not that far away 
> <EM>Ark</EM>.
> 
> ===
> 
> Ramhorn took out his sub-machine, griping about ANOTHER attack, and 
> how he knew he was going to get tooken hostage again, and some 
idiot 
> like that Hot Rod wanna be was going to open fire on the people 
> holding him hostage, even after ordered him not too.
> 
> But wasn't that the fun part?  He transformed to beast mode, 
charging 
> for the nearest way out.
